CustomField.description: Friendly name displayed in timeline component for the thread.
CustomField.formula: Name + IF(CRM_Number_of_unread_Messages__c != 0, ' (' + TEXT(CRM_Number_of_unread_Messages__c) + ' ulest' + IF(CRM_Number_of_unread_Messages__c == 1, '','e') + ' meldinger)', ' (Lest)')
CustomField.label: Timeline Name
